title: 3 and Out - Big Ben Farewell, Belichick's Revenge, Eagles Turnaround, NFC Playoffs, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Big Ben Farewell, Belichick's Revenge, Eagles Turnaround, NFC Playoffs, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Steelers taking down the Browns in Big Ben's last home game, explains what Belichick's return to the postseason means for his legacy, who deserves credit for the Eagles making the postseason after several disappointing seasons, his take on the NFC Playoff picture, and why the Chargers missing the playoffs would be a huge indictment on HC Brandon Staley, He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
